content:
From: Tobias Nipkow <nipkow@in.tum.de>
At the annual VerifyThis competition at TACAS last weekend
https://conf.researchr.org/track/etaps-2019/verifythis-2019-papers
http://www.pm.inf.ethz.ch/research/verifythis.html
the Isabelle team Peter Lammich + Simon Wimmer won again - same as last year:

http://www.pm.inf.ethz.ch/research/verifythis/Archive/2018.html

What is more, a second Isabelle team, Mohammad Abdulaziz + Max Haslbeck, won the
Most Distiguished Tool Feature prinze for a concurrency library.

Unfortunately the 2019 results are not online yet.

Maybe this success will imspire some other Isabelle teams to compete at
VerifyThis next year?

Tobias
smime.p7s

From: Andrei Popescu <A.Popescu@mdx.ac.uk>
Congratulations to Peter, Simon, Mohammad and Max! This is a great service to our community.

Best wishes,

Andrei

From: Peter Lammich <lammich@in.tum.de>

Unfortunately the 2019 results are not online yet.
They are!
http://www.pm.inf.ethz.ch/research/verifythis/Prizes.html
